Package serverSide.sharedRegions

Class ConcentrationSite

  • java.lang.Object
    • serverSide.sharedRegions.ConcentrationSite
  • public class ConcentrationSite
extends java.lang.Object
    Concentration Site where ordinary thieves wait for orders.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ConcentrationSite​(GeneralRepositoryStub generalRepository, AssaultPartyStub[] assaultParties, CollectionSiteStub collectionSite)
      Public constructor for the Concentration Site shared region.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean amINeeded()
      Called by an Ordinary Thief to wait for orders.
      int getAssaultParty​(int thief)
      Returns the Assault Party the Ordinary Thief is a part of.
      void prepareAssaultParty​(int assaultParty)
      Called by the master thief, when enough ordinary thieves are available and there is still a room with paintings - Synchronization point between Master Thief and every Ordinary Thief constituting the Assault Party.
      int prepareExcursion()
      Ordinary Thief waits for the Master Thief to dispatch the designed Assault Party.
      void shutdown()
      Shuts down the Concentration Site server.
      void sumUpResults()
      The Master Thief announces the end of operations and shares the number of paintings acquired in the heist.

    • Method Detail

      • prepareAssaultParty

        public void prepareAssaultParty​(int assaultParty)
        Called by the master thief, when enough ordinary thieves are available and there is still a room with paintings - Synchronization point between Master Thief and every Ordinary Thief constituting the Assault Party.
        Parameters:
        assaultParty - the Assault Party identification.

      • sumUpResults

        public void sumUpResults()
        The Master Thief announces the end of operations and shares the number of paintings acquired in the heist.

      • amINeeded

        public boolean amINeeded()
        Called by an Ordinary Thief to wait for orders.
        Returns:
        true if needed, false otherwise.

      • prepareExcursion

        public int prepareExcursion()
        Ordinary Thief waits for the Master Thief to dispatch the designed Assault Party.
        Returns:
        the Assault Party identification.

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Shuts down the Concentration Site server.

      • getAssaultParty

        public int getAssaultParty​(int thief)
        Returns the Assault Party the Ordinary Thief is a part of.
        Returns:
        the identification of the Assault Party the Ordinary Thief belongs to or -1 if none.
